Superpowers.Name: Take the Hit
Superpowers.Effect: When an attack targets the character that created this Substitute, the attack can be redirected to the Substitute if it is within range 1 of the attacking character.

Superpowers.Name: Sacrificial Figure
Superpowers.Effect: When the Substitute takes damage equal to its Stamina, it is removed from the game. The character that created the Substitute does not take any overflow damage.
